ideas.title: LOB Microprice–Midprice Divergence (sub-minute drift)
ideas.core_idea: Microprice (size-weighted best bid/ask) diverging from midquote reflects latent pressure from the dominant side of the book; the divergence tends to resolve via short-horizon price moves.
feature_transformations: Microprice vs midquote difference; rolling z-score over 60–300 ticks
Top-of-book volume imbalance with EWMA smoothing (λ≈0.1)
ideas.universe_filters: US large-cap; price > $5; ADV > $20M; spread ≤ 2 ticks; exclude halts and first/last 5 minutes
ideas.directionality: Cross-sectional rank; long positive z-scores, short negative; beta/industry neutral; exit on reversion or 60–600s time-stop

strength_actionability.rationale: Clear mechanism, public formulas, liquid universe and standard replay/backtest workflow

ideas.expected_horizon_notes: Backtest 2018–2025 full-tick; 6 weeks live monitoring for execution/slippage calibration

ideas.title: Top-of-Book Queue Imbalance (directional lead)
ideas.core_idea: Sustained queue imbalance at the touch anticipates near-term directional prints as one side of the book depletes faster.
feature_transformations: Queue imbalance ratio across L1–L5; EWMA(2–5s)
Microtrend filter using short midquote slope
ideas.universe_filters: High-liquidity US names; spread=1 tick majority of day; ADV > $10M
ideas.directionality: Threshold entries (|QIR|>0.6), exit ≤60s or on reversion; beta-hedged intraday

strength_actionability.rationale: Well-documented imbalance mechanic; execution latency is primary friction

ideas.title: Order-Flow Imbalance (OFI) & Impact Micro Alpha
ideas.core_idea: Volume-time aggregated signed order-flow imbalance predicts short-horizon price impact; normalize by spread/volatility for cross-name comparability.
feature_transformations: OFI over fixed volume buckets; rolling z-score
Volume-time bars to stabilize event intensity
ideas.directionality: Enter on OFI z>2 (long) or <−2 (short); time-stop 30–180s; avoid earnings windows

strength_actionability.rationale: Public parsers and clear transforms; robust on liquid names

ideas.title: VPIN (Flow Toxicity) + Quote Imbalance Spike
ideas.core_idea: High VPIN percentiles, especially with concurrent quote imbalance, flag informed-flow regimes and directional pressure.
feature_transformations: VPIN in volume-time; 80th percentile regime flag
ideas.directionality: Trade with net flow direction; scale down in wide spread regimes

strength_actionability.rationale: Open implementation; needs careful trade-sign logic

ideas.title: NASDAQ Closing Auction Imbalance (Optiver TAC)
ideas.core_idea: Large market-on-close imbalance relative to typical auction volume drives predictable pressure into the cross and partial mean-reversion after.
feature_transformations: Indicative match price drift vs intraday VWAP
Imbalance flip counts in last 10 minutes
ideas.universe_filters: NASDAQ 100 + liquid mid/large caps; exclude thin auctions
ideas.directionality: Trade with imbalance into 15:59; fade partially post-cross; beta-hedged

strength_actionability.rationale: Public dataset and feature recipes enable precise replication

ideas.title: Stock–Synthetic Index Residual Mispricing at the Close
ideas.core_idea: Reconstruct synthetic index weights intraday; trade single-name residual vs index into the cross when imbalance is large.
feature_transformations: Intraday regression to infer stock weight in synthetic index
ideas.directionality: Long underperforming residuals (same-sign imbalance); short outperformers

strength_actionability.rationale: Clear RV construction; execution key

ideas.expected_horizon_notes: Align with TAC sample; forward test 6 weeks

ideas.title: Post‑Earnings Announcement Drift (SUE-ranked)
ideas.core_idea: Cross-sectional ranking on standardized earnings surprises shows persistent post-event drift as investors update slowly.
feature_transformations: Abnormal volume ratio on event day
ideas.directionality: Long top SUE decile; short bottom; hold 10–20 days; industry neutral

strength_actionability.rationale: Multiple public pipelines enable replication

ideas.title: Analyst EPS Revisions Momentum (IBES)
ideas.core_idea: 3‑month net EPS estimate revisions predict forward returns as allocators rebalance toward improving names.
feature_transformations: ΔConsensus EPS(3M) scaled; analyst quality weights
ideas.directionality: Monthly long–short; beta/industry neutral

strength_actionability.rationale: Toolkit eases WRDS workflows; well-documented factor

ideas.title: Earnings Call LM Lexicon Net Tone
ideas.core_idea: Net positive tone in call transcripts (LM dictionaries) predicts short-horizon drift; adjust for event severity and guidance mentions.
ideas.directionality: Long high-tone; short low-tone; 1–3 day hold

strength_actionability.rationale: Open pipeline from scrape to backtest

ideas.title: FinBERT Q&A Negativity Differential
ideas.core_idea: Q&A sentiment more negative than prepared remarks signals unexpected concerns; short-term underperformance ensues.
feature_transformations: FinBERT sentiment for Q&A vs prepared
ideas.directionality: Short large negative spread; long positive

strength_actionability.rationale: Clear, testable differential; public model

ideas.title: Overnight News Sentiment Factor
ideas.core_idea: Aggregate prior-evening news sentiment into a cross-sectional alpha vector predicting open-to-open returns.
ideas.directionality: Daily long–short at close; hedge beta

strength_actionability.rationale: Data feed stability required; template exists

ideas.title: One-Day Reversal (Volume-Conditioned)
ideas.core_idea: Fade extreme 1D moves when volume is elevated and no event is present; mean-reversion in liquidity shocks.
feature_transformations: Exit on VWAP cross or 2 days
ideas.directionality: Long worst decile; short best decile; sector-neutral

strength_actionability.rationale: Robust baseline with public templates

ideas.title: 52‑Week High Breakout (Trend Persistence)
ideas.core_idea: Names breaking 52‑week highs with confirming breadth/volume continue to attract flows; filter false breakouts.
ideas.directionality: Enter on breakout; ATR trailing stops; sector caps

strength_actionability.rationale: Clear transforms; open notebook

ideas.title: Turn-of-the-Month / Payday Seasonality (ETFs)
ideas.core_idea: Index ETFs show month-end/start and payday flow patterns; exploit with short windows and risk filters.
ideas.directionality: Long around turn; flatten in high VIX

strength_actionability.rationale: Effect size time-varying; trivial to test

ideas.title: Insider Cluster Buys (Form 4)
ideas.core_idea: Multiple insider open-market buys within 30 days scaled by float predict positive drift.
feature_transformations: Scaled insider buy value / float cap
ideas.directionality: Long high scaled cluster buys; 20D hold

strength_actionability.rationale: Open scrapers and filters available

ideas.title: Short Interest / Days-to-Cover Shock
ideas.core_idea: Spikes in days-to-cover and borrow costs predict squeezes after positive catalysts and negative drift absent catalysts.
ideas.directionality: Two-sided conditional on catalyst

strength_actionability.rationale: Data availability/quality dependent; examples exist

ideas.title: Value Investors Club Publication Attention Effect
ideas.core_idea: VIC posts—especially winners—induce short-horizon attention flows; trade in thesis direction over limited windows.
feature_transformations: Event time from post; winner flag
ideas.universe_filters: Liquid US names; exclude illiquid microcaps
ideas.directionality: Enter at publish; hold 5–20 sessions; hedge beta

strength_actionability.rationale: Open analysis suggests concentrated effect

ideas.title: Accruals Anomaly (Low Accruals → Higher Returns)
ideas.core_idea: Low total accruals scaled by assets signal higher earnings quality and subsequent returns; combine with profitability for robustness.
ideas.directionality: Quarterly long low-accruals; short high

strength_actionability.rationale: Canonical, simple to reproduce

ideas.title: Gross Profitability & Quality Composite
ideas.core_idea: Blend gross profitability, leverage, and earnings stability into a sector-neutral composite; tilt toward high-quality names.
ideas.universe_filters: Mid/Large caps; ex-financials if leverage used
ideas.directionality: Quarterly long top-quality; short bottom

strength_actionability.rationale: Public toolkits and notebooks cover required metrics

ideas.title: GTJA‑191 Technical Factor Ensemble
ideas.core_idea: Rank-blend a diversified subset of GTJA‑191 technical alphas (VWAP/HL/volume nonlinears); sector-neutral with turnover controls.
ideas.directionality: Weekly long–short composite

strength_actionability.rationale: Open implementations; flexible ensemble design
